_header: Sure ye remember as of before
_description: William Dunbar, To the King — seventeen 5-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Exces of thocht dois me mischeif’

CULLl510.First Lines:
…How sould I leif and I not landit Nor ȝitt with
                    benefice am blandit…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…In hoip sir of ȝour adiutorieExces of thocht dois me
                    mischeiff
CULLl510.Note:
Last two stanzas only. Refrain, ‘Exces of thocht dois me
                    mischeif’.

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Schir ȝe Remember as befoirHow þat my ȝouthe is done
                    forloir…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…In hoip Sir of ȝour adiutorieExces of thocht dois me
                    mischeiff

         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.346-8.
MacKenzie,  William Mackay. 
             The Poems of William Dunbar.
         Edinburgh, 1932: 41-3.

Banna.First Lines:
Schir ȝit remembir as of befoirhow þat my ȝowth I
                    done forloir…
Banna.Last Lines:
…In howp schir of ȝour adiutoryExcess of thocht dois me
                    mischeif
